title: Graves and Cigar.
body:
Finally. Graves got his cigar back. It had been 2 long years since he saw him last. Graves and Cigar were like peas and carrots. They would do everything together, go to pubs and get into fights, target practice, and occasionally they would they would sleep in the same bed when a storm was passing by. 

But one day that all changed. They were separated. Cigar had got him self into a little bit on trouble, he robbed a jewellery store.
He was sent to Piltover's prison for five long years. "Graves... I've been stupid lately and made wrong decisions... they're locking me up." "WHAT? WHOS THEY I WON'T LET THEM DO THIS" "It's Gangplank and Miss Fortune... I tried robbing their store down in Piltover. I'm, I'm so sorry it has to be this way Graves" Graves closed his eyes hoping this was a dream.  And just like before. Cigar was gone out of Graves life once more.

replies.body: Cigar and Graves, a true love story :(
This story hits me in the feels </3 :'(
Haha yea glad you can relate :D
